name: Batrachomyomachia
description:
Batrachomyomachia

Live the epic battle between mices and frogs and read all the poem as you play.

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to point where you are facing.

Mouse Left Button throw your spear or swing your sword.

Mouse Right Button block.

Spears are automatical picked up when you first touch them if you do not have one.

Sounds from https://freesound.org/ (editted)

Translation to English by George Chapman. (Can be founded at https://archive.org/details/homersbatrachomy00chapuoft
